summary: Created new minimal Vite scaffold for GitHub Pages deployment. Replaced package.json with minimal dependencies (React 18, Vite, TypeScript only - removed all other deps). Updated vite.config.ts for GitHub Pages (base: '/abadan-haly/', build to docs/). Created new minimal components (Header, Gallery, ProductCard) with clean design. Added styles.css with provided design system. Set up product data structure in src/data/products.ts. Updated index.html with SEO and Open Graph tags. Fixed script path and removed PostCSS/Tailwind configs. Build verified successful - outputs to docs/ folder. Created comprehensive README with deployment instructions.
current_status: New minimal scaffold complete and verified. Project is now a clean, static carpet gallery ready for GitHub Pages. Build succeeds and outputs to docs/ folder. Ready to add product images to src/assets/products/ and deploy to GitHub Pages.
